common.title: Digital World: Video Processing Assistant
common.addDirTip: Will find all video files in the selected folder and subfolders
common.taskThreadsNumberTip: The larger the number of task threads, the more CPU and memory will be consumed. For ordinary computers, it is recommended to choose 1-3.
common.customResolutionTip1: If not set, the source resolution of the video will be used.
common.customResolutionTip2: If only width or height is set, the other value will be automatically calculated based on the ratio of the video resolution.
common.customResolutionTip3: If the original width and height of the video is smaller than the set width and height, the original resolution of the video will be used.
common.customResolutionTip4: If the original width and height of the video is greater than the set width and height, the video will be reduced proportionally.

videoCut.addVideoTip1: Currently only supports MP4 format videos
videoCut.addVideoTip2: If it is a video in other formats, please convert the format to MP4 first.
videoCut.startTimeTip: Set the start time in the video control bar
videoCut.endTimeTip: Set the end time in the video control bar
videoCut.settingTimeTip1: This operation cannot be performed while the video is being cut.
videoCut.settingTimeTip2: The end time must be greater than the start time

videoMerge.videoBitrateTip: The larger the value, the better the video quality, but the larger the size.

videoCompress.crfTip: The larger the value, the worse the video quality and the higher the compression rate.
videoCompress.bitRateTip1: The higher the bitrate, the larger the video size.
videoCompress.bitRateTip2: If the original bitrate of the video is less than the set bitrate, the original bitrate of the video will be used.
videoCompress.frameRateTip1: Numbers from 10 to 60. The higher the frame rate, the larger the video size.
videoCompress.frameRateTip11: If the original frame rate of the video is less than the set frame rate, the original frame rate of the video will be used.
videoCompress.frameRateTip3: Must be a number from 10 to 60 (maximum 2 decimal places)

videoFormatConvert.newFormatNoSettingTip: Please set target format for all videos

videoAddWatermark.opacityTip: The larger the value, the lower the transparency.
videoAddWatermark.checkPositionTip2: Incorrect input of text watermark coordinates
videoAddWatermark.previewLoadingTip: Please wait, preview video clips are being generated
videoAddWatermark.settingDataValiErrTip: The watermark setting data is incomplete, please check
